# [Interview #1160: Shadows of Self-Oak Brook, IL, Entry #91](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1160#91)

#### Question

A nicrosil Ferring stores Investiture. Would a Nicrosil Compounder be able to gain Investiture up to the power of a Shard by infinitely compounding?

#### Brandon Sanderson

I talk a lot about that in an upcoming Mistborn book. So thatâ€™s a RAFO. The reading is coming. I will explain what it does.
